bibliographic-data.invention-title: FORMULATION ACARICIDE SANS DANGER POUR L'ENVIRONNEMENT

address.address-1: 1840, 10th Main Road, 34th Cross, Banshankari II Stage
319, IC Cross, II Phase, 6th Block, Banshankari III Stage
1840, 10th Main Road, 34th Cross, Banshankari II Stage
319, IC Cross, II Phase, 6th Block, Banshankari III Stage

abstract.p: This invention relates to an environment friendly acaricide formulation composition for the control of house dust mites comprising: plant derived acaricidal agent 0.01-0.1 % wt./vol.; plant derived disinfectant agent 0.3-3 % wt./vol.; plant derived protein denaturan 0.1-2 % wt./vol.; fungistat agent 0.1-3 % wt./vol.; dispersing agent (alcohol) 99.69-91.9 % wt./vol.
